job_title: Engineering Manager & Senior Software Engineer - Python | Remote
job_description:
About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More

Position: Senior Software Engineer and Engineering Manager

Location: Flexible work arrangements available - New York City or Texas. Choose from on-site, hybrid, or fully remote options.

Salary: Competitive range of \(115,000 - \)185,000 (base salary, negotiable based on experience)

Join a pioneering billion-dollar fintech organization that is redefining the consumer lending landscape! We are actively engaged in reengineering our platforms, tools, and infrastructure, with a strong emphasis on automated underwriting, innovative credit products, and in-house financing solutions.

Key Responsibilities


Ensure application functionality through rigorous validation and automated testing to identify regressions.
Conduct code reviews and troubleshoot bugs, guaranteeing optimal application performance.
Collaborate with a highly skilled and supportive team on diverse, focused projects.


Required Skills


Extensive experience in Python, Django, PostgreSQL, JavaScript, React, and Node.js is essential.
A background in similar technologies will also be considered beneficial.


Qualifications


Senior Software Engineer: A minimum of 5 years of experience in Python, Java, and JavaScript.
Engineering Manager: At least 7 years of experience in software development and team leadership.
Familiarity with the finance sector is advantageous.


Career Growth Opportunities


This role presents significant potential for career advancement within the dynamic fintech sector, providing opportunities to engage with cutting-edge technologies and contribute to impactful projects.


Company Culture And Values


Our organization promotes a culture of innovation and collaboration, where diverse ideas are encouraged, creating a vibrant environment for all team members.


Please Note: This position is exclusively open to candidates currently residing in the U.S. Unfortunately, we are unable to provide sponsorship for work visas at this time.

If you are poised to elevate your career and embark on an exciting journey within the fintech sector, we invite you to connect with us!

Employment Type: Full-Time

job_title: Remote Python Developer with SQL Proficiency
job_description:
About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More

Job Overview

Join our innovative team as a Python Developer specializing in backend services and SQL. This remote position allows you to leverage your skills in a dynamic environment centered around growth and excellence.

Key Responsibilities


Develop and sustain RESTful API backend services using Python, with frameworks such as Flask, Datadog, and Celery.
Design and implement Python SDKs for diverse applications.
Manage programmatic job scheduling and data pipelines using tools like Airflow.
Utilize Amazon Aurora and/or PostgreSQL within a production setting to ensure seamless data access and integrity.


Required Skills


Proficient in Python, demonstrating a solid grasp of Object-Oriented Programming principles.
Strong SQL capabilities complemented by experience in SQL tuning techniques.
Familiarity with tools including Pip, Conda, Presto, Hive, and Spark to enhance development efficiency.


Qualifications


Demonstrated experience in backend service development utilizing Python.
Proven proficiency in managing RESTful APIs and backend services.
A bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline is preferred.


Career Growth Opportunities

This role presents a remarkable opportunity for professional advancement as you will work with cutting-edge technologies and collaborate with a highly skilled team, enhancing your expertise in backend development.

Company Culture And Values

Our company values innovation, collaboration, and diversity. We foster a supportive remote work culture that emphasizes teamwork and creative problem-solving, allowing you to thrive in your role while maintaining a healthy work-life balance.

Networking And Professional Opportunities

Engage with industry professionals and expand your network through collaboration and shared learning experiences within our esteemed organization.

Compensation And Benefits


Competitive salary commensurate with experience.
Flexible work environment promoting a balance between professional and personal commitments.
Opportunities for continued training and professional development.


Employment Type: Contractor

About the job

Title of job

Python/AWS Developer

Location of job

USA

SUPERVISOR

Director, Informatics

About BAO Systems

BAO Systems is an industry leader in digital data solutions for health and development. We empower our partners to implement scalable and sustainable solutions that uncover data-driven insights to improve livelihoods, strengthen health systems, and achieve equitable human development.

Our team comprises passionate public health and development practitioners, information system experts, software engineers, system engineers, Python/AWS Developers, monitoring and evaluation advisors, and data scientists. We excel in providing a broad spectrum of services and products. For more information, please visit www.baosystems.com

Purpose of the role

We are seeking an experienced Python/AWS Developer to support the implementation of a modern data platform built using serverless AWS architecture for a global health project. We will ensure that data are ingested, processed, stored, and made available to a multitude of stakeholders at the country, project, and global levels for evidenced-based decision making. The platform is the foundation for the program’s business intelligence, data processing, and data extraction tools.

The ideal candidate understands the full software development lifecycle and approaches software development with a focus on APIs, automation, declarative infrastructure, and continuous integration and deployment. The role involves developing software and solutions using Python, R, and SQL on AWS architecture as well as ensuring quality assurance. This role can be based in the DC area or remote, with the ability to obtain a US Government Public Trust background check.

Core job responsibilities


Define and write acceptance tests to validate the functionality and performance of front-end interfaces and data processing workloads
Collaborate closely with developers and subject matter experts to understand requirements and design effective test strategies
Create sample data sets to simulate real-world scenarios and test various positive and negative scenarios
Execute test cases, identify and document defects, and work with the development team to resolve issues
Continuously improve testing processes and methodologies to enhance the overall quality of our data processing systems
Document test plans, test cases, and test results for future reference


Required Skills/experience


Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
2+ years of hands-on programming experience. 
Proven experience as a QA Engineer, Python/AWS Developer, specifically in testing data processing workloads
Strong knowledge of software testing methodologies, tools, and best practices
Comfort working with APIs, CLIs, and SDKs (Python) for implementing test cases
Proficiency in defining and writing acceptance tests
Familiarity with data processing technologies and frameworks
Strong working knowledge of git, GitHub, and distributed version control systems
Proficient with SDLC processes and working in an agile environment
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
Strong communication and collaboration abilities


Desired Qualifications:


Strong experience with AWS services, particularly Cloudformation, Lambda (Python), Step Functions, Glue, DynamoDB, S3, Cloudwatch, SNS/SQS, and API Gateway
US Government Experience or International Public Health Background


Classification

Full-Time

About the job

At JustDeal, we're redefining how B2B sales teams handle pricing, approvals, and risk—automating the entire process with AI. Our mission is to build fast, scalable, and intelligent systems that empower businesses to close deals faster.

We’re looking for a Software Engineer in Test (SDET) Intern to help build and enhance our test automation framework, ensuring the reliability and performance of JustDeal’s platform. If you’re passionate about breaking things before customers do and love writing automation scripts, this role is for you!




What You’ll Do
Develop automated test frameworks for web applications, APIs, and backend services.
Design and execute integration, regression, and performance tests to validate system reliability.
Work closely with software engineers to identify and resolve defects early in the development cycle.
Implement CI/CD testing pipelines to automate quality assurance processes.
Gain hands-on experience with Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, JUnit, pytest, or other testing tools.




What We Look For
Pursuing a Bachelor in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (graduating Dec 2025 or later). No Masters/PhD.
Must be a US Citizen.
Strong coding skills in Python, Java, JavaScript, or TypeScript for test automation.
Familiarity with testing frameworks like Selenium, Playwright, Cypress, JUnit, or pytest.
Experience or coursework in CI/CD, DevOps, or cloud-based testing (AWS/GCP/Azure) is a plus.
Passion for automation, debugging, and delivering high-quality software.




Why JustDeal?

✅ Work on real-world automation projects that impact product reliability with paid salary.

✅ Gain exposure to end-to-end testing in a fast-moving AI-driven startup.

✅ Collaborate with top engineers and learn best practices in software quality assurance.

✅ Flexible work environment—remote, hybrid, or in-office options available.
